Title: Don't It Just Break Your Heart
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Jeffrey Lieber (teleplay by), Bianca Sams (story by), Jeffrey Lieber (story by), Kyle Arrington (executive story editor), Beau DeMayo (executive story editor), K.C. Perry (executive story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Charles Michael Davis, Yusuf Gatewood
Plot: A mysterious clue sent to Klaus (Joseph Morgan) leads him one step closer to finding Hayley. Antoinette (guest star Jaime Murray) opens up to Elijah (Daniel Gillies) after her past comes ...
